description.dutch: Win een online gamesessie.
description.english: Win an online game session.
description.french: Remporter une session de jeu en ligne.
description.italian: Vinci una sessione di gioco online.
description.schinese: 赢得一次在线游戏会话。
description.spanish: Gana una sesión de juego en línea.

description.dutch: Verzamel 35 Solar tijdens lancering met de drop-pod.
description.english: Collect 35 Solar on a drop-pod drop.
description.french: Récolter 35 unités de Solaire dans la capsule de largage.
description.italian: Raccogli 35 Solar mentre sei nella Capsula d'atterraggio.
description.portuguese: Colete 35 Solars durante a queda do módulo de pouso.
description.russian: Собрать 35 ед. соляра во время полета на спускаемой капсуле.
description.schinese: 在一次空降舱掉落过程中收集35个太阳能。
description.spanish: Recoge 35 solares en una caída de cápsula.

description.dutch: Scoor de meeste punten van beiden teams in een online gamesessie.
description.english: Make the most kills of both teams in an online game session.
description.french: Totaliser le plus de victimes à la fin d'une session de jeu en ligne.
description.german: Erziele die meisten Kills von beiden Teams in einer Online-Spielsession.
description.italian: Ottieni il maggior numero di uccisioni di entrambe le squadre in una sessione di gioco online.
description.portuguese: Tenha o maior número de eliminações dos dois times numa partida online.
description.russian: Убить наибольшее количество врагов среди обеих команд за время онлайн-матча.
description.schinese: 在一次在线游戏会话中，成为两支战队杀敌数最多者。
description.spanish: Consigue el máximo de muertes de ambos equipos en una sesión de juego en línea.

description.dutch: Win een gamesessie met twee vrienden splitscreen.
description.english: Win a game session with 2 friends splitscreen.
description.french: Remporter une session de jeu avec deux amis en écran partagé.
description.german: Gewinne eine Splitscreen-Spielsession mit zwei Freunden.
description.italian: Vinci una sessione di gioco online in schermo condiviso con 2 amici.
description.portuguese: Vença uma partida com 2 amigos no modo de tela dividida.
description.russian: Одержать победу с двумя друзьями сплитскрином.
description.schinese: 分屏模式下，与2位好友赢得一次游戏会话。
description.spanish: Gana una sesión de juego con 2 amigos en pantalla dividida.

description.dutch: Speel een gamesessie met vrienden via het gamesessie setup scherm.
description.english: Play a game session with friends invited through the game session setup.
description.french: Jouer une session de jeu avec des invités à partir de l'écran de configuration de la session de jeu.
description.german: Spiele eine Session mit Freunden, die über den Bildschirm mit den Einstellungen eingeladen wurden.
description.italian: Gioca a una partita con amici invitati nella schermata delle impostazioni della sessione di gioco.
description.portuguese: Jogue uma partida online com amigos convidados através do sistema de configuração de partida.
description.russian: Сыграть матч с друзьями, пригласив их через экран выбора параметров матча.
description.schinese: 通过游戏会话设置与邀请的好友进行一次游戏会话。
description.spanish: Juega una sesión con amigos invitados desde la configuración de la sesión de juego.

description.dutch: Versla 10 vijandelijke spelers.
description.english: Kill 10 enemy Awesomenauts.
description.french: Tuer 10 ennemis Awesomenauts.
description.italian: Uccidi 10 Awesomenauts nemici.
description.schinese: 杀死10名敌方王牌英雄。
description.spanish: Elimina 10 Awesomenauts enemigos.

displayName.french: Les dinosaurs n'aiment pas les boîtes de cerveaux
displayName.italian: Ai dinosauri non piacciono le scatole
displayName.portuguese: Dinossauros não gostam de caixas cranianas
displayName.spanish: A los dinosaurios les disgustan los cerebritos

description.dutch: Versla een vijandelijke Awesomenaut zonder items.
description.english: Kill an enemy Awesomenaut without buying any items.
description.french: Tuer un ennemi Awesomenauts sans rien acheter.
description.german: Töte einen gegnerischen Awesomenaut ohne ein Item gekauft zu haben.
description.italian: Uccidi un Awesomenaut nemico senza comprare nessun oggetto
description.portuguese: Mate um Awesomenaut inimigo sem comprar nenhum item.
description.russian: Убейте вражеского навта, не купив ничего в магазине.
description.schinese: 不购买任何物品杀死一名敌方王牌英雄。
description.spanish: Elimina un Awesomenaut enemigo sin comprar árticulos.

description.dutch: Versla 30 vijandelijke spelers.
description.english: Kill 30 enemy Awesomenauts.
description.french: Tuer 30 ennemis Awesomenauts.
description.italian: Uccidi 30 Awesomenauts nemici.
description.schinese: 杀死30名敌方王牌英雄。
description.spanish: Elimina 30 Awesomenauts enemigos.

description.dutch: Versla 100 vijandelijke spelers.
description.english: Kill 100 enemy Awesomenauts.
description.french: Tuer 100 ennemis Awesomenauts.
description.italian: Uccidi 100 Awesomenauts nemici.
description.schinese: 杀死100名敌方王牌英雄。
description.spanish: Elimina 100 Awesomenauts enemigos.

description.dutch: Win 10 online gamesessies.
description.english: Win 10 online game sessions.
description.french: Remporter 10 sessions de jeu en ligne.
description.italian: Vinci 10 sessioni di gioco online.
description.schinese: 赢得10次在线游戏会话。
description.spanish: Gana 10 sesiones de juegon en línea.

description.dutch: Win 30 online gamesessies.
description.english: Win 30 online game sessions.
description.french: Remporter 30 sessions de jeu en ligne.
description.italian: Vinci 30 sessioni di gioco online.
description.schinese: 赢得30次在线游戏会话。
description.spanish: Gana 30 sesiones de juegon en línea.

description.dutch: Win 50 online gamesessies.
description.english: Win 50 online game sessions.
description.french: Remporter 50 sessions de jeu en ligne.
description.italian: Vinci 50 sessioni di gioco online.
description.schinese: 赢得50次在线游戏会话。
description.spanish: Gana 50 sesiones de juegon en línea.

description.dutch: Win 100 online gamesessies.
description.english: Win 100 online game sessions.
description.french: Remporter 100 sessions de jeu en ligne.
description.italian: Vinci 100 sessioni di gioco online.
description.schinese: 赢得100次在线游戏会话。
description.spanish: Gana 100 sesiones de juegon en línea.

displayName.italian: Robot che combattono le loro ombre.
displayName.schinese: 机器人与他们的影子搏斗
displayName.spanish: Los robots pelean contra su sombra

description.dutch: Speel tegen een team met dezelfde Awesomenauts.
description.english: Play against a team with the same Awesomenauts.
description.french: Jouer contre une équipe ayant les même Awesomenauts.
description.german: Trete gegen ein Team mit den selben Awesomenauts an.
description.italian: Gioca contro una squadra composta dagli stessi Awesomenauts
description.portuguese: Jogue contra um time com os mesmo Awesomenauts.
description.russian: Сыграть против команды с таким же набором навтов.
description.schinese: 同拥有相同王牌英雄的战队对抗。
description.spanish: Juega contra un equipo con los mismos Awesomenauts.

description.dutch: Hoon een vijand nadat je hem verslagen hebt.
description.english: Taunt an enemy after killing him.
description.french: Se moquer d'un ennemi après l'avoir tué.
description.german: Verspotte einen Gegner nachdem du ihn getötet hast.
description.italian: Provoca un nemico dopo averlo ucciso.
description.schinese: 杀死一名敌人后嘲讽他。
description.spanish: Haz burla de un enemigo después de eliminarlo.

displayName.english: I will have my vengeance Venger!
displayName.german: Ich werde meine Rache bekommen, Venger!

description.dutch: Hoon een vijand nadat hij jou verslagen heeft.
description.english: Taunt an enemy after he killed you.
description.french: Se moquer d'un ennemi après s'être fait tuer par lui.
description.german: Verspotte einen Gegner nachdem er dich getötet hat.
description.italian: Provoca un nemico dopo essere stato ucciso.
description.portuguese: Proveque um inimigo após ele te eliminar.
description.russian: Сделайте насмешку после того, как вас убили.
description.schinese: 在一名敌人杀死你之后嘲讽他。
description.spanish: Haz burla de un enemigo después de que te haya eliminado.

description.dutch: Win een spel in minder dan 10 minuten.
description.english: Win a game in less than 10 minutes.
description.french: Remporter une partie en moins de 10 minutes.
description.german: Gewinne ein Spiel in unter 10 Minuten.
description.italian: Vinci una partita in meno di 10 minuti.
description.portuguese: Vença uma partida em menos de 10 minutos.
description.russian: Выиграть матч менее чем за 10 минут.
description.schinese: 10分钟内赢得一场比赛。
description.spanish: Gana un juego en menos de 10 minutos.

description.dutch: Versla 4 torens in een game.
description.english: Destroy 4 turrets in a single match.
description.french: Détruire 4 tourelles en une partie.
description.german: Zerstöre 4 Geschütze in einem einzigen Match.
description.italian: Distruggi 4 torrette in una singola partita.
description.schinese: 在一场比赛中摧毁4个炮塔。
description.spanish: Destruye 4 torretas en una misma partida.

description.dutch: Versla 3 vijandelijke Awesomenauts zonder dood te gaan.
description.english: Kill 3 enemy Awesomenauts without dying.
description.french: Tuez 3 Awesomenauts adverse sans mourir.
description.german: Töte 3 Awesomenauts ohne dabei zu sterben.
description.italian: Uccidi 3 Awesomenauts senza morire.
description.russian: Убейте 3 вражеских навтов, при этом не погибнув самим.
description.schinese: 在自己不死的情况下杀死3名敌方王牌英雄。
description.spanish: Elimina 3 Awesomeauts enemigos sin morir.

description.dutch: Versla 5 vijandelijke Awesomenauts zonder dood te gaan.
description.english: Kill 5 enemy Awesomenauts without dying.
description.french: Tuez 5 Awesomenauts adverse sans mourir.
description.german: Töte 5 Awesomenauts ohne dabei zu sterben.
description.italian: Uccidi 5 Awesomenauts senza morire.
description.russian: Убейте 5 вражеских навтов, при этом не погибнув самим.
description.schinese: 在自己不死的情况下杀死5名敌方王牌英雄。
description.spanish: Elimina 5 Awesomeauts enemigos sin morir.

description.dutch: Versla 7 vijandelijke Awesomenauts zonder dood te gaan.
description.english: Kill 7 enemy Awesomenauts without dying.

description.german: Töte 7 Awesomenauts ohne dabei zu sterben.

description.russian: Убейте 7 вражеских навтов, при этом не погибнув самим.
description.schinese: 在自己不死的情况下杀死7名敌方王牌英雄。
description.spanish: Elimina 7 Awesomeauts enemigos sin morir.

description.dutch: Wordt verslagen door een monster.
description.english: Get killed by a creep.
description.french: Tué par une nestioles.
description.italian: Fatti uccidere da un mostro.
description.schinese: 被一只蠕虫杀死。
description.spanish: Muere a manos de un bicho

displayName.schinese: 无需辅助工具的巡视员

description.dutch: Verzamel 500 Solar zonder het uit te geven (laatkom bonus wordt niet meegeteld).
description.english: Have more than 500 Solar at once (late game bonus does not count).
description.french: Avoir plus de 500 unités de Solaire (les bonus de partie tardive ne compte pas).
description.german: Habe mehr als 500 Solar auf einmal (Bonus vom späten Spielbeitritt zählt nicht).
description.italian: Arriva ad avere 500 solar in una volta (i bonus di partita già iniziata non contano)
description.portuguese: Tenha mais que 500 solars de uma vez (o bonus de final de partida não conta).
description.russian: Собрать более 500 ед. соляра за матч (бонусы за присоединение к матчу не учитываются).
description.schinese: 立刻拥有超过500个太阳能（后期游戏奖励不算在内）。
description.spanish: Tenga mas de 500 Solar en un momento (bono de entrada tarde no cuenta)

displayName.italian: A cavallo del mio destriero robotico

description.dutch: Versla als eerste een vijandelijke Awesomenaut.
description.english: Get first blood.
description.french: Premier sang.
description.italian: Ottieni un primo sangue.
description.schinese: 获得第一滴血。
description.spanish: Consigue la primera sangre.

description.dutch: Win gamesessies met 8 verschillende karakters.
description.english: Win game sessions with 8 different characters.
description.french: Remporter des sessions de jeu avec 8 personnages différents.
description.italian: Vinci sessioni di gioco con 8 diversi personaggi.
description.russian: Победить в матчах, сыграв восемью различными персонажами.
description.schinese: 使用8个不同的角色赢得一次游戏会话。
description.spanish: Gana sesiones de juego con 8 personajes diferentes.

description.dutch: Raak geïnfecteerd!
description.english: Get Infected!
description.french: Attrapez l'infection!
description.italian: Vieni infettato!
description.schinese: 被感染！
description.spanish: ¡Inféctate!

description.dutch: Wordt AWESOME!
description.english: Become AWESOME!
description.french: Devenez AWESOME!
description.italian: Diventa AWESOME!
description.schinese: 成为王牌！
description.spanish: Conviertete en AWESOME!

displayName.spanish: Aumento para la pipa de Snorkle

description.dutch: Dood de Solar Baas voor de ronde 2:10 aan de gang is.
description.english: Kill the Solar boss before the 2:10 minute mark.
description.french: Tuer le Boss Solaire avant 2:10 minutes dans une partie.
description.german: Töte den Solar Boss in weniger als 2:10 Minuten.
description.italian: Uccidi il Solar boss prima di 2:10 minuti.
description.portuguese: Mate o chefão Solar antes de 2:10 minutos de partida.
description.schinese: 在2:10分标记之前杀死太阳能首领。
description.spanish: Mata al jefe Solar antes de la marca de 2:10 minutos.

displayName.dutch: Geen enkele macht kan dit olieblik tegenhouden!
displayName.english: No might can stop this oil can!
displayName.french: Aucune force ne peut stopper cette canette d'huile !
displayName.german: Keine Macht der Welt kann diese Ölkanne stoppen!
displayName.italian: Niente può fermare questa lattina d'olio!
displayName.portuguese: Nenhuma força consegue parar essa lata de óleo!
displayName.spanish: Ningún poder puede parar este bote de aceite!

description.dutch: Haal de hoogst mogelijke maximale gezondheid met Clunk.
description.english: Get the maximum possible health with Clunk.
description.french: Obtenez le maximum de vie possible avec Clunk.
description.italian: Raggiungi la massima salute possibile con Clunk.
description.portuguese: Consiga a vida máxima possível como Clunk.
description.russian: Получить максимальный уровень здоровья, играя Кланком.
description.schinese: 选用克兰克获得可达到的最大生命值。
description.spanish: Obtén la máxima cantidad de salud posible con Clunk.

displayName.dutch: Deels robot, deels mens. Grotendeels robot.
displayName.english: Part robot, part human. Mostly robot.
displayName.french: À la fois robot et humain. Mais surtout robot.
displayName.german: Halb Mensch, halb Maschine. Eher Maschine.
displayName.italian: Parte robot, parte umano. Principalmente robot.
displayName.portuguese: Parte robô, parte humano. Mais robô.
displayName.russian: Полуробот, получеловек. По большей части робот.
displayName.schinese: 半人半机械。大部分是机器。
displayName.spanish: Parte robot, parte humano. Mayormente robot.

description.dutch: Dood Ted McPain als Clunk.
description.english: Kill Ted Mc Pain as Clunk.
description.french: Tuer Ted Mc Pain en tant que Clunk.
description.italian: Uccidi Ted Mc Pain con Clunk.
description.schinese: 选用克兰克杀死泰德·麦克佩恩。
description.spanish: Mata a Ted Mc Pain como Clunk.

description.dutch: Race met Coco van Solarboor naar Solarboor in minder dan 15 seconden op Sorona.
description.english: Race with Coco from Solar Drill to Solar Drill in less than 15 seconds on Sorona.
description.french: Avec Coco, foncez d'une Foreuse à Solaire à l'autre en moins de 15 secondes sur Sorona.
description.german: Laufe mit Coco auf Sorona in weniger als 15 Sekunden von einem Solarbohrer zum anderen.
description.italian: Corri da una Trivella Solar all'altra con Coco in meno di 15 secondi su Sorona.
description.portuguese: Corra de um extrator Solar ao outro como Coco em menos de 15 segundos em Sorona.
description.russian: Добраться от одного солярного бура до другого, уложившись в 15 секунд на Сороне.
description.schinese: 在索罗纳，15[L:SECONDS]内完成与可可从太阳能钻机到太阳能钻机的比赛。
description.spanish: Corre con Coco de Taladro Solar a Taladro Solar en menos de 15 segundos en Sorona.

description.dutch: Voer 10 keer graslings aan de worm.
description.english: Feed the weedlings to the worm 10 times.
description.french: Nourissez le ver 10 fois avec des Mauvaises herbes.
description.italian: Dai da mangiare le piantine al verme 10 volte.
description.portuguese: Mate ervinhas com o verme 10 vezes.
